question_id: Tampilkan daftar resep dessert yang masih aktif—sertakan ID resep, judul resep, dan nama masakan.
sql_query:
SELECT
  m.kode_masakan AS kode_masakan,
  m.nama_masakan AS nama_masakan,
  m.kategori AS kategori
FROM Masakan AS m
JOIN Resep AS r
  ON m.kode_masakan = r.kode_masakan
WHERE
  m.status_aktif = TRUE
  AND r.status_aktif = TRUE
  AND m.asal_daerah IN ('Indonesia')
  AND m.level_pedas <= 3
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
  m.kode_masakan AS kode_masakan,
  m.nama_masakan AS nama_masakan,
  m.kategori AS kategori
FROM Masakan AS m
JOIN Resep AS r
  ON m.kode_masakan = r.kode_masakan
WHERE
  m.status_aktif = TRUE
  AND r.status_aktif = TRUE
  AND m.asal_daerah IN ('Indonesia')
  AND m.level_pedas <= 3;
```
